It's better to restrict it to only the origins where your frontend is hosted.\n\nFor production, you should configure this with a specific list of allowed origins, which can be loaded from environment variables. For local development, you can specify the local frontend URL.\n\nExample:\n```python\n# In production, load this from environment variables\nallowed_origins = [\"http://localhost:8080\", \"https://your-production-domain.com\"]\nCORS(app, origins=allowed_origins, resources={r\"/api/*\": {}})\n```","created_at":"2025-10-06T21:41:25Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T21:41:25Z","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/90#discussion_r2408716298","pull_request_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/90","author_association":"CONTRIBUTOR","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408716298"},"html":{"href":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/90#discussion_r2408716298"},"pull_request":{"href":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/90"}},"reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408716298/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"start_line":null,"original_start_line":null,"start_side":null,"line":78,"original_line":78,"side":"RIGHT","original_position":12,"position":12,"subject_type":"line"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408716303","pull_request_review_id":3307547748,"id":2408716303,"node_id":"PRRC_kwDOOcuOYs6PkhgP","diff_hunk":"@@ -30,6 +30,30 @@
